Class PersonList

  • java.lang.Object
    • countryComponents.PersonList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PersonList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Project #4 CS 2334, Section 010 April 16, 2015

    A sort-of wrapper for an ArrayList of Persons

    Version:
    2.0

      • sortUsing

        Sorts people using comparator. If comparator is null, uses natural ordering. Changes currentlySortedBy.
        Parameters:
        comparator - How people should be sorted

      • returnAfterSortingUsing

        public PersonList returnAfterSortingUsing(java.util.Comparator<Person> comparator)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • exactSearchFor

        public PersonList exactSearchFor(java.lang.String key,
                                 java.util.Comparator<Person> comparator)
        Searches people for and returns Persons with data that exactly match key
        Parameters:
        key - Either a full name, a first name, a last name, or a String representation of a date, depending on the comparator
        comparator - How the searching will be done
        Returns:
        A PersonList with Person objects whose data exactly matches the key, if there is none return null

      • partialSearchNamesFor

        public PersonList partialSearchNamesFor(java.lang.String name)
        Searches people for and returns Persons with full names that contain key
        Parameters:
        name - What the Persons in the returned PersonList should contain in their full names
        Returns:
        A PersonList with Person objects whose full names contain the key

      • combineWith

        private PersonList combineWith(PersonList person)
        Merges two Persons into one
        Parameters:
        person - The Person to be merged with the Person this is called on.
        Returns:
        a combination of the PersonList that the combineWith method was called for and the PersonList the combineWith method was sent

      • combineTwoPersonLists

        public static PersonList combineTwoPersonLists(PersonList a,
                                               PersonList b)
        Combines two PersonLists in a way that does not jeopardize the safety of City objects
        Parameters:
        a - a PersonList
        b - a PersonList
        Returns:
        A PersonList made from using combineWith(a) and combineWith(b) on an empty personList;
